generateHuffmanHeap(HashMap<Character, Integer>, int) - Static method in class pakkaaminen.Huffman
Initializes the heap by populating it with 1-sized HuffmanTrees.
generateHuffmanTree(MinHeap) - Static method in class pakkaaminen.Huffman
Generates the final Huffman tree by picking two nodes with the smallest weights and adding them back into the heap until the size of the heap is 1.
